title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Service-Learning Design Based on Active Learning for Engineering Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate practical engineering application skills by designing and implementing service-learning projects that address community issues
Learners enhance communication and leadership skills during team-based problem-solving processes using collaboration tools (LMS, digital platforms)

Learners self-diagnose their technical competencies (coding test scores, project completeness) and soft skills (collaboration, communication) development through reflective journaling (1,000 characters) and peer evaluation (3 peers) every four weeks, then create personalized development plans based on diagnostic results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
